TextAsset.value: Do you want to date an awesome, fighting soul like me?!
I guess it's not impossible, but don't hold your breath.
No, I will never date you. Never ever ever ever ever.
(Somehow, Taira dragged me into this Wrestleball thing.
To be honest, I’m not that crazy about sports...
Unless rolling up stuff is a sport.
Which I’m pretty sure it isn’t.
Anyway, at least it’ll get me out of having to sit in detention for a while.)
Yo ${slot:playerName}! I’m so PUMPED that you joined the team!
We needed a new Ninja Player for the left field.
What kind of game is this, anyway?
“the sport of only the coolest toughest RAD POWER-WARRIORS?!”
(Do “they” call it that, or is it just him?)
What are you, some kinda dumb baby?
Did you move here from Baby Town?!
I moved here from Baby Town.

Two teams of roughly a dozen players square off the goal of moving the ball into the endzone, either with a power kick or by running with it. Obviously power kicks are WAY more rad. Anyway- the game begins with a scramble and the ball is dropped at the center between five of the starting players from each side. Offensive and defensive players can use any number of wrestling moves to get the ball from the other team and usually have a signature style that earns extra points. The players can obstruct or knock out opponents when trying to get the ball. That’s the basics but it gets tricky when you start to factor in the ninja and wing players whose function is to blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah....
(Okay, he’s not REALLY saying “blah blah blah.”
That’s kinda all I can hear at this point though.
I really, really don’t get sports...
The rules for this one seem even more complicated than usual.
Still, if Taira can actually understand all this?
Maybe he’s not such a dumb meathead after all.)
...and kicked goals are worth double but only when the ball is in a powerzone and handled by a non-defensive player.
YO, THAT’S WHY WRESTLEBALL TOTALLY RUUUULES!
So now that I’ve explained Wrestleball to you...
It’s totally your favorite thing in the whole world FOREVER, right?!
How could anyone NOT love Wrestleball?!
I guess I’m just feelin’ nervous or something,
since it’s my favorite thing and...
it’d be really cool if you liked it too.
It’s my favorite thing, um, forever.
And all those other things you said.
YEAAAHHHH!!!! NAMCO HIGH WRESTLEBALL SQUAD FOREVER!!!!
I’m gonna be real with you now, okay?
Even though you’re tiny and small...
Like a little baby bird with hollow bones...
All delicate and small and unable to defend yourself...
Because you’re a wimpy nerd who never played sports before and you probably lived in your mom’s basement or something....
And even though the other Wrestleball team is full of huge guys...
Guys who will absolutely crush you in one second...
(Wh... What have I gotten myself into...)
(The ref’s coming out onto the field...
I’m even a little scared of OUR team.
Taira is way bigger than any of them.
I have to admit, I feel safe knowing he’s on my side.)
(Whoah! Everyone’s running out onto the field at once!
I can’t even see where the ball is...
Augh! That guy almost stepped on my head!
I think he was even on MY team!
Okay, what am I supposed to do again?
Taira said something about... power kicks...
What does any of that even mean?
What am I supposed to do?
AUGH! WHAT’S THAT COMING TOWARD ME!
That players are allowed to use...
To get the ball away from the other team?
That explains why all those big guys are coming towards me...
Haha, I was just messin’ with ya, bro.
(It’s like he’s in some kind of...
There he goes running off, before I could say any more...
Oh gosh! He’s slamming into all the other players!
He’s taking them out one by one!
But he’s knocking his own teammates out too...
Maybe there’s more going on with him than I realized.)
If he can be driven into blind rages like this.
He’s still making sure to score all the goals, even in his “blind rage.”)
Well, at least the match is over early...
Didja see me get revenge for you?
I did good, didn’t I? HAW!
I got hurt in the match, remember?!
I forgot how, like, gentle and delicate you are.
There you go again with that “delicate” stuff...
But that’s not important right now.
You saw me, right? During the game?
While I was avenging my clan and stuff back there!
Unless you wanna look like an IDIOT! Haw haw!
I don’t have to answer that!
You mean all that revenge stuff...
All that stuff about caring about me...
About getting revenge for me being hurt...
So you could show off your, your...
To think of you getting hurt like that...
It’s like, totally the not coolest thing ever!
Once I saw you get knocked out...
For you, and for my clan!
Sounds like it might be a touchy subject.)
If you thought I didn’t care...
Besides... I could never fake revenge!
I try super hard to incorporate revenge into every part of my life!
But, at least he knows what he likes, I guess?)
And... just because I’m getting revenge...
Doesn’t mean I don’t want you to think I look hot.
Because if you think I look hot...
You might want to date me.
And, you’re a nice guy and all...
You said I have a cool face and hot muscles.
Yeah, but there’s more to it than that!
We don’t have much in common, do we?
You already said you love Wrestleball so much, that it’s your favorite thing forever!
I did say that... Didn’t I...
Well, you’re not gonna believe this, but...
That’s EXACTLY how I feel about Wrestleball, too!
I haven’t really thought about it before.
I guess if someone did something bad to me...
I’d probably want to get revenge for it.
In stories and stuff, revenge always seems so empty, you know?
The person who got revenge never really feels satisfied...
Sometimes they even ruin their lives trying to get it.
Doesn’t really seem like the best idea, does it?
It’s kind of a moral gray area.
Does that mean you like revenge?
YO! That’s two out of three...
Of my top favorite awesomest interests!
I have walked this cruel earth alone.
With my pure, fighting heart beating flames in my tireless chest.
Needs a soul of beauty and grace at its side.
Beauty, grace, and mutual awesome interests and hobbies.
And give purpose to the fighting heart’s toil.
have been awaiting the day I meet...
A beautiful, delicate, tiny, gentle, frail soul.
Like a single, trembling sakura petal in the palm of a warrior’s hand.
Sakura petal?! Do I really seem like that much of a wimp?!
Must guard and protect the delicate soul!
Keep it safe from the dangers of this cruel world!
An awesome, fighting soul like me?!
I guess it’s not impossible, but don’t hold your breath
I never hold my breath! I’m undead.
My hot bod and food-eating is gonna win you over, I bet!
But I don’t have to admit that!
Wait, why does he eat food if he’s undead?
Taira no Kagekiyo is totally a man of honor!
If you are... certain... that you never want to date me...
For the rest of your life, forever...
What kind of a jerk would I be to do anything else…
I’m a noble warrior, yo! That’s not how I roll!
As sad as it is, I gotta listen to what you want and all that junk…
That’s not at all what I was expecting.
I’ll leave you alone forever now.
Not as much of a jerk as I thought.
I could maybe see myself dating someone like that.
And even if I could date SOMEONE like that…
The answer is still PRETTY MUCH no!
But if I keep showing you I’m like, hot AND sensitive and stuff…
You might want to date me?!
I’m gonna go home now though...
I definitely need an icepack after today.
Look, not to get all emotional or nothin’...
Even though you’re a puny nerd...
Like, seriously, the puniest I’ve ever seen, probably...
And even though you suck at Wrestleball...
You should TOTALLY keep doing it!
Everybody should get to do the stuff they love to do!
Even if they suck at it!
In fact, it’s kinda even MORE hardcore that way!
And if anyone tells you different...
I’ll get revenge for you and PULVERIZE ‘EM!!!
(I don’t have the heart to tell him I don’t really like Wrestleball.
But that’s not really the point, is it?
He’s right... except maybe about the pulverizing part)
That was really cool of you to say.
Let’s both keep trying our best, okay?
Especially if we suck at it!
It’s kinda cute how excited he gets.
Like a big dog or something.
I guess he’s not so bad...
